original_text:
Lorelei’s Pearls
La Red Rake ha deciso di puntare sul mondo del mare per dare vita a Lorelei’s Pearls. La protagonista è una sirena, figura mitologica il cui canto ammaliante fa impazzire gli uomini, come ben decantato da Omero nell’Odissea. Ma nel nostro immaginario la sirena ha le sembianze di una bellissima donna con la coda di un pesce al posto delle gambe senza avere alcuna intenzione bellicosa. L’ambientazione di Lorelei’s Pearls è una grotta marina popolata da numerosi animali acquatici, resa realistica dal lavoro che la Red Rake ha fatto per quel che riguarda la grafica. Simboli ad alta definizione e qualche buona animazione rendono il gioco altamente piacevole.
Caratteristiche della slot
La griglia di gioco è quella tradizionale, con 5 rulli, 3 linee e 25 linee fisse. Un pregio di questa slot è il range di scommessa adatto a giocatori inesperti ma anche a chi in una slot ricerca soprattutto il brivido dell’azzardo. È possibile un minimo di 0,25 € (0,01 € per spin) sino a un massimo di 35 €. Si vince se compaiono almeno 3 simboli in successione partendo da sinistra verso destra. Per chi volesse, è possibile selezionare tra 5 e 100 giri automatici senza dover impostare per forza dei limiti di vincita o di perdita. La volatilità è media, si vince abbastanza di frequente e sempre cifre di buon livello. Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è pari al 95,4%, in linea con la maggioranza delle altre slot. Per chiarezza, ricordiamo che questi due dati sono solo ipotetici e testati sui grandi numeri, che a volte possono raggiungere le centinaia di migliaia di partite giocate.
Simboli e funzionalità
Come accade spesso, a pagare meno sono i simboli delle carte da gioco, dal J all’Asso. I simboli tematici hanno valore più alto. Tra di essi troviamo il cavalluccio marino, la razza e l’aragosta. Il simbolo Wild è il delfino e oltre a ricompensare nel caso compaia 3 volte, sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter e la sirena Lorelei. Inoltre, il simbolo Wild raddoppia le vincite ottenute. Lo Scatter è rappresentato dalla conchiglia con all’interno una perla e premia se compare almeno 2 volte sui rulli 1, 3 e 5. Con 3 simboli inoltre si ha diritto a 15 giri gratuiti. Durante i free spins i simboli di basso valore vengono rimossi.
Una funzione speciale è quella denominata Lorelei Fusion Minigame, che si attiva quando sui rulli compare il simbolo della sirena almeno 3 volte. All’inizio del gioco sulla griglia vuota compariranno 7 Lorelei di basso valore. A ogni giro, i simboli rimarranno fissi, e gli slot liberi verranno occupati da nuovi simboli Lorelei che si fonderanno. Ogni fusione farà crescere il livello delle nostre vincite che può arrivare sino a un massimo di 10.000 volte la nostra puntata!

raw_translation.response:
Lorelei’s Pearls
La Red Rake has set its sights on the sea to create Lorelei's Pearls. The protagonist is a mermaid, a mythical figure whose enchanting song drives men crazy, as Homer famously described in the Odyssey. In our imagination, however, the mermaid is a beautiful woman with a fish tail instead of legs and no bellicose intentions. The setting of Lorelei's Pearls is an underwater cave populated by numerous aquatic animals, made realistic by the Red Rake's work on graphics. High-definition symbols and some excellent animations make the game highly enjoyable.

Slot Features
The game grid is the traditional one, with 5 reels, 3 rows, and 25 fixed lines. One of the advantages of this slot is the betting range, suitable for both inexperienced players and those who seek the thrill of gambling. The minimum bet is 0.25 € (0.01 € per spin), and the maximum bet is 35 €. You win if at least 3 symbols appear in succession from left to right. For those who wish, it is possible to select between 5 and 100 automatic spins without having to set any limits on wins or losses. The volatility is medium, with frequent wins and always good amounts. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 95.4%, in line with most other slots. For the record, these two data are hypothetical and tested on large numbers, which can sometimes reach hundreds of thousands of games played.

Symbols and Features
As often happens, the card symbols pay less, from J to Ace. Thematic symbols have a higher value. Among them, we find the seahorse, the ray, and the lobster. The Wild symbol is the dolphin and rewards you if it appears 3 times while replacing all symbols except the Scatter and the mermaid Lorelei. In addition, the Wild symbol doubles the winnings obtained. The Scatter is represented by the shell with a pearl inside and rewards you if it appears at least 2 times on reels 1, 3, and 5. With 3 symbols, you are entitled to 15 free spins. During the free spins, the low-value symbols are removed.

A special feature is the Lorelei Fusion Minigame, which is activated when the mermaid symbol appears on the reels at least 3 times. At the beginning of the game, 7 low-value Loreleis will appear on the empty grid. With each spin, the symbols will remain fixed, and the free slots will be occupied by new Lorelei symbols that will fuse. Each fusion will increase the level of our winnings, which can reach up to 10,000 times our bet!

raw_translation.response:
Experience the enchanting world of Lorelei's Pearls, a slot game from La Red Rake set amidst the depths of the ocean. Immerse yourself in the world of this mythical siren, whose alluring song is said to drive men crazy - just as Homer described in the Odyssey. Stunning graphics bring the underwater cave and its many creatures to life, creating an experience that is nothing short of mesmerizing.

Featuring 5 reels, 3 rows, and a fixed 25 paylines, Lorelei's Pearls offers a range of betting options suitable for new players and seasoned gamblers alike. With a minimum bet of €0.25 and a maximum of €35, there is plenty of opportunity to win big. Land 3 symbols in sequence from left to right, and you'll walk away a winner. And with a medium volatility and high-quality symbols and animations, you're sure to enjoy every spin.

The game's symbols include the standard playing cards ranging from J to Ace, as well as thematic symbols like seahorses, stingrays, and lobsters. The Wild symbol, represented by a dolphin, not only pays out for landing 3 or more times, but also doubles any winnings. Land 2 or more Scatter symbols - a shell containing a pearl - on reels 1, 3, and 5, and you'll activate the bonus round, where you can earn 15 free spins. During the bonus round, low-value symbols are removed, maximizing your chances of winning big.

And that's not all - Lorelei's Fusion Minigame is another chance for you to increase your winnings. Land 3 or more Lorelei symbols on the reels, and you'll enter this exciting game. Seven low-value Lorelei symbols will appear on an empty reel, and with each spin, they will merge to create a new, higher-value symbol. Keep merging the symbols to boost your winnings, with the potential to win up to 10,000 times your original bet.

Experience the magic of the ocean with Lorelei's Pearls - a game that offers stunning graphics, exciting gameplay, and the potential for big wins.

Game Graphics and Animations

Red Rake has created Lorelei's Pearls, a slot game set in an underwater cave filled with numerous aquatic animals, made realistic by Red Rake's work on graphics. High-definition symbols and excellent animations make the game highly enjoyable. Players are treated to a visually stunning game that will keep them entertained for hours.

Gameplay Features - Lorelei Fusion Minigame

Lorelei's Pearls has a unique feature called the Lorelei Fusion Minigame that is activated when the mermaid symbol appears on the reels at least 3 times. This feature is full of excitement and can increase your winnings up to 10,000 times your bet. At the beginning of the game, seven low-value Loreleis will appear on the empty grid. With each spin, the symbols will remain fixed, and the free slots will be occupied by new Lorelei symbols that will fuse. Each fusion will increase the level of our winnings, making this feature one of the most exciting and rewarding in the game.

Game Symbols and Payouts

Lorelei's Pearls features a mix of thematic symbols and card symbols. The card symbols pay less, ranging from J to Ace. Thematic symbols such as the seahorse, the ray, and the lobster have a higher value. The Wild symbol is the dolphin and rewards you if it appears three times while replacing all symbols except the Scatter and the mermaid Lorelei. In addition, the Wild symbol doubles the winnings obtained. The Scatter is represented by the shell with a pearl inside and rewards you if it appears at least two times on reels 1, 3, and 5. 

Free Spins Feature

Lorelei's Pearls also features a free spins feature. To activate this feature, players need to land three Scatter symbols on reels 1, 3, and 5. Players will be awarded 15 free spins during which the low-value symbols will be removed, increasing your chances of winning big. This feature is not only exciting but also highly rewarding, increasing your chances of hitting a big payout. 

Game Volatility and RTP

Lorelei's Pearls is a medium volatility slot game with frequent wins and always good amounts. The betting range is suitable for both inexperienced players and those who seek the thrill of gambling. The minimum bet is 0.25 € (0.01 € per spin), and the maximum bet is 35 €. The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 95.4%, in line with most other slots. Players can play with the confidence that they have a fair chance of hitting a win and that their gameplay will be exciting and enjoyable.
